Paper & card recycling: Green wheelie bin | Collected every 2 weeks

Mixed recycling: Green box | Collected every 2 weeks (alternates with paper and card)

Rubbish: Brown wheelie bin | Collected every 2 weeks

Food waste recycling (outdoors): Large brown caddy | Collected every week

Recycling batteries: Place in an untied plastic bag on top of your bin

Recycling textiles and shoes: Place in a tied plastic bag on top of your bin

Paper & card recycling: Black wheelie bin with blue lid

Mixed recycling: Green communal bin with red lid

Rubbish: Silver metal bin with black lid
